parameter.name: accountKey
parameter.description: The account number or account ID

parameter.name: contractEffectiveDate
parameter.description: Effective contract date for this subscription, as yyyy-mm-dd

parameter.name: subscribeToRatePlans
parameter.description: Container for one or more rate plans for this subscription

parameter.name: invoiceOwnerAccountKey
parameter.description: Invoice owner account number or ID

parameter.name: serviceActivationDate
parameter.description: The date on which the services or products within a subscription have been activated and access has been provided to the customer

parameter.name: customerAcceptanceDate
parameter.description: The date on which the services or products within a subscription have been accepted by the customer, as yyyy-mm-dd

parameter.name: termStartDate
parameter.description: The date on which the subscription term begins

parameter.name: initialTerm
parameter.description: Duration of the first term of the subscription

parameter.name: initialTermPeriodType
parameter.description: The period type of the initial term.

parameter.name: invoiceCollect
parameter.description: If true (default), an invoice is generated and payment collected automatically during the subscription process

parameter.name: invoiceTargetDate
parameter.description: Date through which to calculate charges if an invoice is generated

parameter.name: invoiceSeparately
parameter.description: Separates a single subscription from other subscriptions and invoices the charge independently

parameter.name: previewType
parameter.description: The type of preview you will receive

parameter.name: includeExistingDraftInvoiceItems
parameter.description: Specifies whether to include draft invoice items in subscription previews
